name: attogram/attogram-framework
description: The Attogram Framework provides developers a PHP skeleton starter site with a content module system, file-based URL routing, IP-protected backend, Markdown parser, jQuery and Bootstrap.  Core modules available to add an integrated SQLite database with web admin, user system, and more.

suggest.attogram/attogram-base: Base Module for the Attogram Framework
suggest.attogram/attogram-database: Database Module for the Attogram Framework
suggest.attogram/attogram-user: User Module for the Attogram Framework
